name: Circuit Breaker (itch) (Imperia Studios)
description:
This is a game submitted to the Lost Relic Game Jam of 2022 with the theme Connection!

You are an Infiltration Agent and managed to hack into the main computer of your enemies. 

Now it's time to get out, but since you have no guns, you will have to connect traps around to power terminals and kill your enemies!

CONTROLS: 

WASD - Move

LEFT MOUSE - Connect cable

RIGHT MOUSE - Dash

R - Restart Level
